meanings.definition: Engaged in boisterous merrymaking or revelry.
meanings.sent1: The roistered group of friends laughed loudly at the party.
meanings.sent2: The festival was filled with roistered attendees dancing and singing.
meanings.sent3: The roistered guests at the wedding made the celebration even more joyful.
meanings.sent4: The roistered atmosphere in the pub was infectious, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The roistered crowd cheered and clapped as the band played their favorite song.

meanings.definition: Behaved in a noisy, lively, and unrestrained way.
meanings.sent1: The roistered children ran around the playground, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The roistered fans cheered loudly for their team at the game.
meanings.sent3: The roistered puppies playfully chased each other in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The roistered market was bustling with activity and chatter.
meanings.sent5: The roistered street performers entertained the passersby with their antics.
